name: Akashica
description:
The fabled land of the Great Library, within whose twisted, treacherous halls lies the answer to every question ever asked, every doubt left unspoken and every problem yet unsolved.

Archives and repositories of everything known, unknown and forgotten. The cure to every disease, the key to every lock...

...the undoing to every mind.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Akashica is a procedurally generated, text-based choose your own adventure game with strong cosmic horror themes.

Can you find your way out of the Great Library of myth? Is such a thing even possible? Or are you simply delaying the inevitable...?

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 50

Day-One Update: Two minor bugs and most of the late-night abominations unto grammar have been fixed in v1.0.1. No extra content or functionality has been added, as per the Jam rules.
(Any potential future additional content will be uploaded in a build separate from the LD version.)
